Sure, I can recommend two mystery movies based on their interests.

My first recommendation would be "Gone Girl" which is a psychological thriller directed by Ben Affleck and based on the novel of the same name written by Gillian Flynn.

The movie follows the story of a woman named Amy Dunne who is accused of killing her husband, Nick Dunne. The movie takes the audience through the twists and turns of Amy's life, leading up to her murder trial.

My second recommendation would be "The Machinist" which is a psychological thriller directed by David Fincher and based on the novel of the same name written by Patrick Kennedy.

The movie follows the story of Richard Foster Grant, who is suffering from severe delusions and headaches. The movie takes the audience through the twists and turns of Richard's life, leading up to his breakdown and eventual suicide.

In conclusion, "Gone Girl" and "The Machinist" are both excellent psychological thriller movies that offer plenty of twists and turns, ultimately leading up to their respective climaxes.
